audioText: Quel dommage que tu n'oses pas attrapez cette opportunité professionnelle unique!
question: Quel ______ que tu n'oses pas attrapez cette opportunité professionnelle unique!
explanation: The correct answer is 'dommage' (shame/pity) - expressing regret about a missed opportunity. The complete text is 'Quel dommage que tu n'oses pas attraper cette opportunité professionnelle unique!' - What a shame that you don't dare to grab this unique professional opportunity! This targets noun 'dommage' (damage/shame) and missing verbs 'oses' and 'attrapez'.
